QuestData.Title: Growing Strong
QuestData.Description: Magic has long been a vice of the elves. It shaped us, and lifted us out of the darkness - but without balance, it also threatens to unmake us.$B$BThe shal'dorei are too proud to admit it, but they are the product of indulgence. They live without harmony.$B$BBut I sense potential among the Nightfallen. Losing everything has humbled them. It has made them stronger.$B$BStay the course, $p. Help the Nightfallen rise up.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you felt it? Change is on the wind.
QuestData.RewardText: We shall help the shal'dorei find harmony.
